metadata.title: CVE-2022-48859 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: marvell: prestera: Add missing of_node_put() inprestera_switch_set_base_mac_addrThis node pointer is returned by of_find_compatible_node() withrefcount incremented. Calling of_node_put() to aovid the refcount leak.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
